definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Don't tell us that these are some of the conferences "top secret" documents.
sentences.chinese: 可別說都是些什麼會議上的絕密文件噢。

sentences.english: This is the computer where (=by/on which) he has stolen top-secret documents.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他用來盜竊絕密文件的計算機。

sentences.english: They threaten you to hand out a top-secret document?
sentences.chinese: 他們威脅你把一個絕密文件交出去？

sentences.english: But how do you go about putting top secret documents online without getting caught?
sentences.chinese: 但是怎樣才能在網上發佈絕密文件而不被抓到呢？
